text:
[Verse]
Sparrows on my windowsill
Chirping in the morning light
Bring a smile every day
Nature's song in flight

[Verse 2]
Sunrise paints the sky in gold
New day whispers soft and clear
Feel the breeze upon my face
Grateful just to be here

[Chorus]
Dance with me in the morning sun
Hear the sparrows sing their tune
Life's a simple
Joyous run
Everyday afternoon

[Verse 3]
Laughter echoes down the street
Children playing
Dogs run free
Happiness in every beat
A moment wild and carefree

[Chorus]
Dance with me in the morning sun
Hear the sparrows sing their tune
Life's a simple
Joyous run
Everyday afternoon

[Bridge]
Stars will shine when day is done
Moon will rise
The night begun
Still the sparrows greet the dawn
Melodies from dusk to dawn
title: Sparrows on My Windowsill
